@pytest.mark.asyncio async def test_create_product(): os.makedirs("video01", exist_ok=True)
async with async_playwright() as p: browser = await p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
context = await browser.new_context( record_video_dir="videos", record_video_size={"width": 1280, "height": 720}, )
page = await context.new_page()
try: await page.goto(URL)

await page.get_by_text("Create Products").click()
